CHAPTER.VERS: A khangham bel keimah Johan inLungsim takpi tawh ka hong it ka lawm Gaias tungah lai ka hong khak hi.
Ka lawm it Gaias aw, nang na ci damin na vai khempeuh zong na maa pai ding hi, ci-in ka lamen hi. Kha thu tawh kisai lamsangah zong bangmah lungkhamna om lo ding hi, ci-in ka thei hi.
Nang a mantakin a gamta na hih takpi mah bangin, i Khristian mipih hih lai-a hong pai peuhpeuh in a mantakin na nuntakna thu hong gen uh ahih manin ka nuam mahmah hi.
Tate bangin ka hong neih mite a mantakin a gamtatna uh ka zakna hangin ka lungdamna sangin adang lungdamna lian zaw bangmah om lo hi.
Ka hong it lawm Gaias aw, na theih ngei loh hinapi-in i Khristian mipihte lungsim takpi tawh na na huh hi.
Amaute na limbawlna thu, hih lai-a pawlpite kiangah hong gen uh hi. I biak Pasian’ deihna tawh kituakin a khualzinna uh nuamtakin a zoptheih nadingun na huh in.
Amaute pen Pasian’ nasem dingin a khualzin khia uh hi a, thu um lo mite tung panin bangmah huhna ngah lo uh hi.
Tua ahih manin Pasian thuman nasepna-ah nasem khawm mite ihih theih nadingin ei Khristiante in hih bang mite i huh ding ahi hi.
Na pawlpite kiangah lai ka gelh ngei hi. Ahi zongin na pawlpi sungah milian pen a ut Diotrefes in ka thugen hong mang nuam lo hi.

Tua ahih manin kong pai ciangin kote hong gensiatna, zuauthu a genna le a gamtatna khempeuh ka pholak ding hi. Tua bang mi gensiatna ciang bek hi loin, i Khristian mipihte zin nangawn tungsak nuam lo a, zin a tungsak nuamte nangawn khamin, pawlpi panin hawl khiat ding hanciam lai hi.
Ka hong it lawm Gaias aw, mihoih lote’ gamtatna zui kei inla, mihoihte’ gamtatna zui in. A gamtat hoih mite pen Pasian tawh a kipawl mi hi a, a gamtat hoih lo mite pen Pasian a thei nai lo ahi uh hi.
Mi khempeuh in Demetrias phatkim uh a, a manin ama gamtatna mahmah in hih thu a manna hong kilangsak hi. Kote in zong ama hoihna ka thei uh a, tua ama hoihna ka gennate uh a thuman ahi hi.
Gen ding tampi ka neih hangin lai-in gelhkhiat ding kong sawm kei zaw hi.
Nang tawh kimu baih thei dingin kilamen ka hih manin, tuahun ciangin maitang kimu-in i kiho ding hi.
Nangma tungah nopsakna thupha hong tung tahen. Hih lai-a om i lawmte in hong hopih uh hi. Tua lai-a om i lawmte khempeuh a milipin na hopihsak in.
